T02TD2852E:194a-1: a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva ra kharsa pa na s'a dha nam /
T02TD2852E:194a-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kharsa p'a ni'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD2852E:194a-4: mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2852E:194a-5: yid dang mthun pa'i phyogs gang yang rung bar ji ltar bde pa'i stan la 'dug ste /
T02TD2852E:194a-6: res ris la sogs pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku mdun du bzhugs par dmigs la /
T02TD2852E:194a-7: phyi nang gi mchod pas legs par mchod de /
T02TD2852E:194a-9: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD2852E:194a-10: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02TD2852E:194a-12: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni /
T02TD2852E:194a-13: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2852E:194a-14: sdig pa mi dge so sor bshags //
T02TD2852E:194a-15: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02TD2852E:194a-16: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02TD2852E:194a-17: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bya'o //
T02TD2852E:194a-18: de'i 'og tu rang gi snying gar yi ge aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer dang bcas pa de'i steng du yi ge hr'i: 'od zer 'phro ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs de dag gis chos thams cad drangs nas 'od zer gyi tshogs rnams hr'i:de nyid kyi nang du zhugs pa dang /
T02TD2852E:194a-19: thal mo lan gsum brdabs la tshig 'di lan gsum brjod do //
T02TD2852E:194a-20: aom sva bh'a ba shuddh'a:sarbba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddhonya\ham /
T02TD2852E:194a-21: de'i 'og tu chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2852E:194a-22: tshig gi don dang bcas par bsams nas /
T02TD2852E:194a-23: zla ba bye ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od zer yongs su gyur pa las ral ba'i cod pan gyi dbus na gnas pa'i rgyal ba'i sku 'dzin pa /
T02TD2852E:194a-24: rin po che'i phug gi nang na padma chen po dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing zla ba'i 'od dang ldan pa /
T02TD2852E:194a-25: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2852E:194a-26: zhabs g-yon pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung la g-yas pa cung zad brkyang ba //
T02TD2852E:194b-0: @194b phyag g-yon pa na padma dkar po bsnams pa /
T02TD2852E:194b-1: g-yas kyis mchog sbyin pa zhi ba'o //
T02TD2852E:194b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas logs na bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa autpa la'i snying po kha 'byed par bsam mo //
T02TD2852E:194b-3: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su khro gnyer can cod pan 'chang ba /
T02TD2852E:194b-5: g-yon gnyis na dbyug pa dang /
T02TD2852E:194b-6: spyi blugs bsnams pa g-yas gnyis kyis phyag byed pa dang /
T02TD2852E:194b-8: spyi gtsug las skyes pa'i mchod rten gyis brgyan pa dang /
T02TD2852E:194b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon na khro bo chen po rta mgrin phyag g-yas pa phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02TD2852E:194b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas na nor bzangs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs pa de ltar bsam mo //
T02TD2852E:194b-12: sangs rgyas sprin ni 'phro ba yis //
T02TD2852E:194b-16: bsgoms pas dub par gyur na /
T02TD2852E:194b-17: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sngags mu tig gi phreng ba dang 'dra ba bsams te bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD2852E:194b-18: bzlas pa'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02TD2852E:194b-20: brgya 'am stong du bzlas par bya ste /
T02TD2852E:194b-21: bcom ldan 'das la bdag nyid kyis mchod pa legs par bya'o //
T02TD2852E:194b-22: aom khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzod //
T02TD2852E:194b-23: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02TD2852E:194b-24: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2852E:194b-25: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2852E:194b-26: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gshegs pa dang slar byon par bskul nas bzod par gsol bar bya ste /
T02TD2852E:194b-27: gang yang bdag blo gti mug pas //
T02TD2852E:194b-28: 'dir ni nyes pa gang byas pa //
T02TD2852E:194b-29: gang yang lus can skyabs gyur pas //
T02TD2852E:194b-30: mgon po khyod ni bzod pa bzhes //
T02TD2852E:194b-31: gtso bo nus pa ma mchis pas //
T02TD2852E:194b-32: ma tshang ba dang ma rnyed pa'i //
T02TD2852E:194b-33: 'dir ni bya ba gang byes pa //
T02TD2852E:194b-34: mgon khyed de ni bzod par mdzod //
T02TD2852E:194b-35: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis //
T02TD2852E:194b-36: sangs rgyas nyid ni thob nas kyang //
T02TD2852E:194b-37: srid pa'i rgya mtsho brgal dka' las //
T02TD2852E:194b-38: 'gro ba ma lus sgrol bar shog /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kharsa pa na'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD2852E:195a-1: po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
T02TD2852E:195a-2: lo ts'a ba dge slong sh'akya blo gros kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so//
